stateDiagram

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : RELEASED_DEBOUNCE

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; output_press = false#59; #125;

RELEASED_STABLE

RELEASED_STABLE : RELEASED_STABLE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : PRESSED_DEBOUNCE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; output_press = true#59; #125;

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; output_press_event = true#59; #125;

state PRESSED_STABLE {

        state "$initial_state" as PRESSED_STABLE.(InitialState)

        CONFIRM_LONG

        CONFIRM_LONG : CONFIRM_LONG

        CONFIRM_LONG : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

        PRESSED_LONG

        PRESSED_LONG : PRESSED_LONG

        PRESSED_LONG : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

        PRESSED_LONG : enter / #123; output_long = true#59; #125;

        PRESSED_LONG : enter / #123; output_long_event = true#59; #125;

        PRESSED_REPEAT

        PRESSED_REPEAT : PRESSED_REPEAT

        PRESSED_REPEAT : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

        PRESSED_REPEAT : enter / #123; output_repeat = true#59; #125;

        PRESSED_REPEAT : enter / #123; output_repeat_event = true#59; #125;

}

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE --> RELEASED_STABLE : do [timer_ms > 50]

RELEASED_STABLE --> PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : do [input_active]

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE --> PRESSED_STABLE : do [timer_ms > 50]

PRESSED_STABLE --> RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : do [! input_active] / #123; output_release_event = true#59; #125;

PRESSED_STABLE.(InitialState) --> CONFIRM_LONG

CONFIRM_LONG --> PRESSED_LONG : do [timer_ms > 500]

PRESSED_LONG --> PRESSED_REPEAT : do [timer_ms > 350]

PRESSED_REPEAT --> PRESSED_REPEAT : do [timer_ms > 250]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> RELEASED_DEBOUNCE
Events
settings
